about_the_game:
MimiCries is a Victorian-inspired, narrative-driven puzzle room game where players investigate the devastated remnants of the tragic Griswald family, and escape from the horrors of their accursed residence.

Key Features:


Immersive pixel-art

Drawing creatively from the Victorian period, all pixel-art in MimiCries has been meticulously curated to craft time-accurate environments, with astonishing designs that may literally take your breath away.

Interactive puzzle-solving

Emulating your playable character's point-of-view, MimiCries offers a plethora of object and character interactions, which evolve as you make progress with its variety of unique and challenging puzzles.

Duality of light

As you traverse the dark rooms and corridors of the Griswald mansion in MimiCries, the light sources you have on hand will both help and hinder your exploration. In the engulfing darkness, will light be the key for your freedom?

All mysteries lay in wait for your unravelling. The Griswald mansion beckons...

content_descriptors.notes:
MimiCries contains regular instances of cartoon/fantasy violence. There are a few depictions of weapons and bones/skeletons, and its characters sometimes experience anguish and fear. There are also instances where minor derogatory language is aimed toward the player in this game.

There are also some scenes that may be very frightening for players, and psychological horror is frequently applied in most aspects of gameplay.

name: MimiCries Demo
short_description: Investigate the mysteries of a haunted mansion as you solve various challenging puzzles in this Victorian-inspired, narrative-driven escape room game. With only your wit and a lantern to light the way forward, will the choices you make seal your fate, or open the path to freedom?
